entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
